alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 11:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Carter and southeastern Powder River Counties through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Lightning Flat, or 24 miles southeast of Broadus, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boyes, Belle Creek, Hammond and Ridge. This storm may impact travel on highway 212 northwest of Alzada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
